data.name: Activepieces
data.description: Activepieces is an open source, no-code, AI-first business automation tool. Alternative to Zapier, Make and Workato.

data.name: Aptabase
data.description: Analytics for Apps, open source, simple and privacy-friendly. SDKs for Swift, React Native, Electron, Flutter and many others.

data.name: Argos
data.description: Argos provides the developer tools to debug tests and detect visual regressions.

data.name: Cal.com
data.description: Cal.com is a scheduling tool that helps you schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails.

data.name: ClassroomIO.com
data.description: ClassroomIO is a no-code tool that allows you build and scale your own teaching platform with ease.

data.name: Documenso
data.description: The Open-Source DocuSign Alternative. We aim to earn your trust by enabling you to self-host the platform and examine its inner workings.

data.name: Formbricks
data.description: Open source survey software and Experience Management Platform. Understand your customers, keep full control over your data.

data.name: Hanko
data.description: Open-source authentication and user management for the passkey era. Integrated in minutes, for web and mobile apps.

data.name: Hook0
data.description: Open-Source Webhooks-as-a-service (WaaS) that makes it easy for developers to send webhooks.

data.name: Inbox Zero
data.description: Inbox Zero makes it easy to clean up your inbox and reach inbox zero fast. It provides bulk newsletter unsubscribe, cold email blocking, email analytics, and AI automations.

data.name: Infisical
data.description: Open source, end-to-end encrypted platform that lets you securely manage secrets and configs across your team, devices, and infrastructure.

data.name: KeepHQ
data.description: Keep is an open-source AIOps (AI for IT operations) platform

data.name: Langfuse
data.description: Open source LLM engineering platform. Debug, analyze and iterate together.

data.name: Mockoon
data.description: Mockoon is the easiest and quickest way to design and run mock REST APIs.

data.name: OpenBB
data.description: Democratizing investment research through an open source financial ecosystem. The OpenBB Terminal allows everyone to perform investment research, from everywhere.

data.name: OpenStatus
data.description: Open-source monitoring platform with beautiful status pages

data.name: Papermark
data.description: Open-Source Docsend Alternative to securely share documents with real-time analytics.

data.name: Portkey AI
data.description: AI Gateway with integrated Guardrails. Route to 250+ LLMs and 50+ Guardrails with 1-fast API. Supports caching, retries, and edge deployment for low latency.

data.name: Prisma
data.description: Simplify working with databases. Build, optimize, and grow your app easily with an intuitive data model, type-safety, automated migrations, connection pooling, caching, and real-time db subscriptions.

data.name: Requestly
data.description: Makes frontend development cycle 10x faster with API Client, Mock Server, Intercept & Modify HTTP Requests and Session Replays.

data.name: Rivet
data.description: Open-source solution to deploy, scale, and operate your multiplayer game.

data.name: Shelf.nu
data.description: Open Source Asset and Equipment tracking software that lets you create QR asset labels, manage and overview your assets across locations.

data.name: Sniffnet
data.description: Sniffnet is a network monitoring tool to help you easily keep track of your Internet traffic.

data.name: Tiledesk
data.description: The innovative open-source framework for developing LLM-enabled chatbots, Tiledesk empowers developers to create advanced, conversational AI agents.

data.name: Tolgee
data.description: Software localization from A to Z made really easy.

data.name: Trigger.dev
data.description: Create long-running Jobs directly in your codebase with features like API integrations, webhooks, scheduling and delays.

data.name: Twenty
data.description: A modern CRM offering the flexibility of open-source, advanced features and sleek design.

data.name: Typebot

data.name: Unkey

data.name: Voltagent
